attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Create IOS XR telemetry configuration to stream Segment-Routing data to 172.16.1.20 port 57400 using grpc no-tls."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group SEGMENT_ROUTING
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-mpls-te-oper:mpls-te/segment-routing/sr-node-infos/sr-node-info/sr-node-info
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-segment-routing-srv6-oper:srv6
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 172.16.1.20
    port 57400
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB_SEGMENT_ROUTING
  sensor-group-id SEGMENT_ROUTING sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
